author: Justin Vallejo, Justin Vallejo
title: Coronavirus: Residents of US hotspot sue WHO accusing them of cover-up with China
description: Class action from pandemic's New York epicentre alleges gross negligence
content:
The World Health Organisation is accused of conspiring with the Chinese government to cover up the severity of the coronavirus pandemic, according to a class-action lawsuit filed in New York.
Residents from one of the earliest and hardest-hit counties in the… [+1828 chars]
